channel.title: Explained How to jar And sign Your Webclient
channel.description:
[b]Difficulty 3/10[/b] This is a fully explained Tutorial On how to sign your webclient the right way. If You have any question Feel free to post.
Step 1.
First Of all you Are going to need this. [url=http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/JARMaker.zip]http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/JARMaker.zip[/url] Jar Maker Right click And extract to desktop Like This [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step1.png[/img]
Step 2. Now Open Jar maker. Now Click on Jarmaker.jar [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step2.png[/img]
Step 3. (jaring) Now For your [b]Output Directory[/b] Would be Jarmaker [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step3.png[/img]
Now For output jar file You will see something like this [b]demorpg.jar[/b] Change to [b]client.jar[/b]
Now For input directory click the [b]...[/b] Look for where Your client Files are [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step4.png[/img]
Now Click Manifest Template
Where It Says Main class just type [b]client[/b] Click set Manifest Now click Create Jar
CONGRATULATIONS YOU HAVE CREATED THE CLIENT.JAR NOW LETS SIGN IT.
Step 4 Now Click on Jar signer [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step5.png[/img] Now click on generate keystore Now for key tool location your going to want this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\keytool.exe Depending on your java Now click on output keystore file click the [b]...[/b] click desktop [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step6.png[/img] Now for key store alias Type your name EG [b](teh-codex)[/b] Public key (password you will remember) EG [b]pass123[/b] Private key (password you will remember) EG [b]pass123[/b] And For keystore identities just remove all the Text Now click Generate Keystore
Now see where it says Keystore Authentication [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/step7.png[/img] Keystore Alias (name you typed) Public Key (pass you typed) Private Key (pass you typed)
NOW CLICK SIGN JAR YOU ARE NOW DONE!!!!!!
Thank you for viewing my topic Any bugs/issues please post.

item.title: Explained How to jar And sign Your Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“artego, post:12, topic:361640”]I have some problems jarring and signing my webclient, I don’t understand what they mean, I do everything correctly, the jar even works if it’s not on my site. I don’t get it, I think I have some problems signing can you help me on Teamviewer?

Edit, this is my error,
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client[/quote]take your cache out of your client xD

@op you just had to make one with pictures eh?

Read full topic

item.description:
@artego wrote:

I have some problems jarring and signing my webclient, I don’t understand what they mean, I do everything correctly, the jar even works if it’s not on my site. I don’t get it, I think I have some problems signing can you help me on Teamviewer?

Edit, this is my error,
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)

at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)

Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client

item.title: Explained How to jar And sign Your Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“unh0ly, post:5, topic:361640”]I followed All the Steps On Ric914’s Webclient TuT, and i have Jarred & signed it as you have explained in your Tut. But, When i run it, it Downloads the Cache, and then it says there is a connection error.

Help please? [/quote]It means the place it searched for your cache in, which is specified in signlink.java, isn’t where the cache is being downloaded. If it is, well then the cache isn’t being downloaded and extracted properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Explained How to jar And sign Your Webclient
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

Difficulty 3/10
This is a fully explained Tutorial On how to sign your webclient the right way.
If You have any question Feel free to post.

Step 1.

First Of all you Are going to need this.
http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/JARMaker.zip
Jar Maker
Right click And extract to desktop Like This

Step 2.
Now Open Jar maker.
Now Click on Jarmaker.jar

Step 3. (jaring)
Now For your Output Directory Would be Jarmaker

Now For output jar file You will see something like this
demorpg.jar
Change to
client.jar

Now For input directory click the …
Look for where Your client Files are

Now Click Manifest Template

Where It Says Main class just type client
Click set Manifest
Now click Create Jar

CONGRATULATIONS YOU HAVE CREATED THE CLIENT.JAR NOW LETS SIGN IT.

Step 4
Now Click on Jar signer

Now click on generate keystore
Now for key tool location your going to want this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\keytool.exe
Depending on your java
Now click on output keystore file click the …
click desktop

Now for key store alias Type your name EG b[/b]
Public key (password you will remember) EG pass123
Private key (password you will remember) EG pass123
And For keystore identities just remove all the Text
Now click Generate Keystore

Now see where it says Keystore Authentication

Keystore Alias (name you typed)
Public Key (pass you typed)
Private Key (pass you typed)

NOW CLICK SIGN JAR YOU ARE NOW DONE!!!

Thank you for viewing my topic Any bugs/issues please post.

Read full topic
item.source: Explained How to jar And sign Your Webclient
